participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and optimistic, Emma enjoys sharing her experiences and often finds humor in everyday situations.
participant_1.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i'm married to a doctor. i live in a three storey house.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Calm and introspective, Liam has a deep appreciation for spirituality and enjoys connecting with others on a profound level.
participant_2.background: i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i live in alaska. i like meditation. i am a buddhist.
